column4: every time I try to install GRUB bootloader (on the alt install CD) it says "UNABLE TO INSTALL GRUB IN (ha0,#). EXECUTING 'grub-install (ha0,#) FAILED. THIS IS A FATAL ERROR. Where # is the sda number of the boot partition.

every time I try to install GRUB bootloader (on the alt install CD) it says "UNABLE TO INSTALL GRUB IN (ha0,#). EXECUTING 'grub-install (ha0,#) FAILED. THIS IS A FATAL ERROR. Where # is the sda number of the boot partition. What did I do wrong anyone???
how do you spell your nick?
obviously I cant read that so could you capitalise or lower case as needed so I can read it
hint: use a more readable font
... (ha#). Where # is the sda number of the boot partition. <- that's nonsense
why are you making suggestions if you couldnt understand my question?
there is no "(ha)" in grub, it's (hdx,y) and grub counts different from /dev/sdXY
why are you making suggestions if you couldnt understand my question?
